title: doc comment for DialIP is unclear
body:
by **mrvnre**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. godoc net DialIP

What is the expected output?

Argument names in the doc comment that match the arguments.

What do you see instead?

func DialIP(netProto string, laddr, raddr *IPAddr) (c *IPConn, err os.Error)
DialIP connects to the remote address raddr on the network net,
which must be "ip", "ip4", or "ip6".

Additional info:

Attached patch is diff from weekly.2011-12-22.
Attachments: 1. DialIP.patch (1088 bytes)
